name: Keydungeon
description:
Keydungeon is a dungeon based, key collecting puzzle game where you adventure through 15 levels placing tiles and finding the correct path to get to the exit.  It starts off simple, but gets harder as levels progress, with new mechanics introduced every few levels. This game was made in about 3 weeks in the Unity Engine and Aseprite. 

I am an independent game developer and if you enjoyed the game and would like to support me, consider tipping me a dollar or two through itch.io's "support this game" button.

Important - If you are using a monitor/laptop without a 16:9 aspect ratio, such as a macbook, click the gray fullscreen button. If you are using normal 16:9 aspect ratio, click the blue fullscreen button.
